title: Picture (Im)perfect Photography: 14 Secrets to Capturing Beautiful Images and Advancing Your Photography Fast
description: I wrote this book with a particular purpose. I want to share with you what I have learned about photography in the past decade. I find photography liberating, inspiring, and relaxing. I am fascinated by photography. The tips and ideas in this photography book are easy to understand and most of them can be applied to any kind of camera. This book not only gives you easy implementable ideas, but it is also loaded with great original pictures that you can use to get inspired. You be the judge. Whether you use the camera of your smartphone, you own a point-and-shoot, or you have invested in the most advanced DSLR, this book has something for you. If you are a beginner or an intermediate photographer committed to improving your photography, it's time to start using your camera at its full potential. After you read this book and practice each of the tips, your photography will get exponentially better.
author: Andrei Anca
